name: Patrick Early v. Braddock Borough, Appellant

judges: Before Sterrett, G. J., Green, Williams, McCollum, Mitchell, Dean and Fell, JJ.
parties: Patrick Early v. Braddock Borough, Appellant.

opinions.text:
Opinion by
Mr. Justice Green,
The judgment in this case is affirmed for the reasons stated in the opinion just filed in the case of William Bowers v. The Borough of Braddock, No. 64, Oct. T., 1895.
Judgment affirmed.
opinions.author: Mr. Justice Green,

casebody.head_matter:
Patrick Early v. Braddock Borough, Appellant.
Argued Oct. 29, 1895.
Appeal, No. 67, Oct. T., 1895, by defendant, from order of C. P. No. 3, Allegheny Co., August Term, 1894, No. 486, dismissing exceptions to report of viewers, and refusing to allow defendant an appeal.
Before Sterrett, G. J., Green, Williams, McCollum, Mitchell, Dean and Fell, JJ.
Affirmed.
January 6, 1896:
